name: The Invader (yuvalbe)
description:
hi guys! its my first game made with unity i learned a lot of things from it and i hope you will enjoy it and leave in the comments things i need to work on them and things that you enjoyed from goodbye!

the assets i used(you can find them in the unity asset store):

1. robot shooting game

2. free pack(for sounds)

3. JMO assets(for effects)

4. free 2D adventure beach pack(for background)

this assets are free
